data.message: I wish you give me the permission to do the chickaslimshady clothing collection please. Mr asshole please you only do things for the men Stans and you never do anything for the ladies Stans. if you don't let do it, I will be your worse COCK BLOG. I will get everyone insane and if I have to I will ask you mum to help to annoying you. I wish to do this collection to give the money to #eminem foundation to do a project in the name of Marshalls mum to help single mums in crisis.  Please Mr asshole, I love you my dear friend. 😉 😜 😘 😍
